column5: A one-year post-graduate programme deepening your knowledge of the theory and practice of investment and risk management.OverviewWho is it for?You are an ambitious recent graduate looking to develop a full range of skills to help launch your career in finance or accounting. This is a highly practical master's course in Investment Management so you’ll need to possess a high level of quantitative skills.Your coursework will involve you in examining accounting and finance from the perspective of those who use financial reports to evaluate company and managerial performance.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
